title: Fab Lab - New Age 2011

For their album New Age they asked a number of composers and artists to contribute one piece of music each. The special thing about the enquiry was that the music would become re-composed.

What they didnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t know was that the music shaped their minds, dragging them into the unknown mysteria of Baalberith. It seemed like the music jointed itself into its place, and some of it were actually never recorded. 2 years of cobbling had led them to a point where they no longer could trust the enigmatic coincidences to be just - chance.

A bewildering rollercoaster ride through countless musical landscapes where nothing is impossible and everything is unexpected. Hardly ever has a cd been more mind-boggling.  (naxos)
